text: James "Jim" Root (born October 2, 1971) is an American musician. He is the guitarist for both Slipknot and Stone Sour. In Slipknot he is named #4. He is the tallest member of the band at 6 feet and 6 inches tall. Jim wears a court jester's mask with a zip-up mouth. Jim enjoys fishing and playing video games in his free time. Category:Musicians from Iowa Category:American rock musicians Category:American heavy metal musicians Category:Musicians from Des Moines, Iowa Category:Slipknot members Category:1971 births Category:Living people
title: Jim Root
